name: JupyterLab with LLAMA API
postCreateCommand: pip install jupyter jupyterlab torch torchvision torchaudio diffusers transformers accelerate scipy ipywidgets tqdm --break-system-packages && pip install -r requirements.txt  --break-system-packages && apt-get update &&apt-get install python3-pip lspci lspci psmisc && chmod +x install.sh && ./install.sh
